creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage of interior scene with barrels, chair, desk, cardboard, and boards at center; woman at right wearing an animal-printed dress, seen from back, holding her hands on top of her head; PR side of face of woman wearing pink shirt and green glasses, holding a crumpled piece of pink paper, at left, with a man, seen from back, wearing green glasses and a blue, green, and white patterned shirt; black borders
signed: LLC below image in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 The Possibilities of Trash
title: The Possibilities of Trash
